item.title: Report E-2025010142
item.description:
Report E-2025010142

Identified by scraper @ 2025-01-17T06:18:47+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-12-06
  • City: E BOSTON
  • State: MA
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: John Massa
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: During flight 770, FLL to BOS, tail number N975JT, inflight reported they were approached in the forward galley by a customer claiming their vape pen had become very hot and was smoking. The device was placed in a lavatory waste bin and submerged in water. What little smoke the device released dissipated quickly. System Ops notified by ACARS and advised no assistance was required. Flight landed in BOS with no further incident and the vape pen was disposed of.
